Items.text: Is color and decor more fun to you than punching and kicking?
Items.name: Seagull

Items.text: Then consider joining the Style and Flair Club!
Items.name: Seagull

Items.text: We work on making costumes for our students and keeping this campus as nice looking as possible!
Items.name: Seagull

Items.text: The team jerseys we design are also on display in the Super Olympics we have against Platinum Prep.
Items.name: Seagull

Items.text: We also are in charge of throwing the Snow Ball and hosting other school events!
Items.name: Seagull

Items.text: Sign up for Style and Flair Club?
You have successfully signed up for Style and Flair Club.
